In the state of Tocantins, it is observed expressive increases of planted areas and of productivity on maize culture, which have been higher than the national mean in the last years. These indicators make the state of Tocantins one of the greatest producers of the North region [ 1], and one of the potential producers of grains of Brazil in a near future [ 2].
